characters.name: Monkey D. Luffy

devil_fruit.name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika
devil_fruit.description: Grants the form and freedom of the Sun God Nika with rubber-like properties and absurd elasticity.

characters.summary: Captain of the Straw Hat Pirates who aims to become the Pirate King.

characters.name: Roronoa Zoro
characters.summary: Master swordsman and Luffy's right hand, striving to become the world's greatest.

characters.name: Nami
characters.summary: Genius navigator and money-savvy cartographer of the crew.

characters.name: Usopp
characters.summary: Courageous sniper and gadgeteer who dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea.

characters.name: Sanji
characters.summary: Chivalrous chef who fights with devastating kicks and refuses to use his hands in combat.

characters.name: Tony Tony Chopper

devil_fruit.name: Hito Hito no Mi
devil_fruit.description: Allows transformations between reindeer, human, and hybrid forms.

characters.summary: Kind-hearted reindeer doctor who ate the Human-Human Fruit.

characters.name: Nico Robin

devil_fruit.name: Hana Hana no Mi
devil_fruit.description: Sprouts extra limbs from any surface to grapple or attack.

characters.summary: Scholar from Ohara and one of the few who can read Poneglyphs.

characters.name: Franky
characters.summary: Brash cyborg shipwright who built the Thousand Sunny.

characters.name: Brook

devil_fruit.name: Yomi Yomi no Mi
devil_fruit.description: Revives the user after death and enables soul-based abilities.

characters.summary: Lively skeleton musician returned to life by the Revive-Revive Fruit.

characters.name: Jinbe
characters.summary: Honorable fish-man master of Fish-Man Karate and crew helmsman.

ships.name: Thousand Sunny
ships.summary: The Straw Hats' second ship built from Adam Wood with the Soldier Dock System.
